title: Test Case Call
description: Event emitted when a call step has been executed in a test case.

node_id.description: The node ID of the test case.

event_type.description: The event type. Always set to 'case_call'.

duration.description: Duration of the call step in seconds.

start.description: Start time of the call step in ISO 8601 format.

stop.description: Stop time of the call step in ISO 8601 format.

error.description: Error details if the call step failed.
